overview: Buah Dahsyat (Fantastic Fruits) is a short film capturing the veiled and coded lives of residents in Boon Lay, Singapore through enigmatic fruits acting as multifarious symbols for intersecting themes including everyday rituals, desire, social mobility and labour. Anchored by the voice of drag queen Luna Thicc, the fruitsâ€™ behaviour and habits become enmeshed with found footage, smartphone videos and kitsch popular culture imagery.
title: Fantastic Fruits
